name: The Creep (BertezBertez)
description:
A kind of arcade RTS game. Play as an ooze monster trying the destroy the humans.

Created as part of Terry Cavanagh's Stop Waiting for Godot game jam. Did not really stick to the optional "Keep it simple theme" First time doing a game jam so I will be honest its a little rough, but I think it is very interesting. Planning to release an updated version with more levels and abilities. If you are interested follow me @InfiniteBertez on twitter.

Hope you enjoy it!
